name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William Darrell DAVENPORT, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Francis M. Socha, for William Darrell Davenport.

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William Darrell DAVENPORT, Appellant.
